item.title: Automatic Dependent Surveillance- Broadcast (ADS-B) System – CDTI Control Panel

numlitem.para: Flight ID can be set, and
Screen display is acceptable to the flight crew.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "CDTI CNTRL PNL INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
